special.translation[0].definitions[0].de: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important
special.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a special place in the classroom for reading
Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
The good china was used only on special occasions.
Each village has its own special charm.
Are you doing anything special for Christmas?
special.translation[0].definitions[1].de: particularly important to someone and deserving attention, love etc
special.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a party with a few special friends
a teacher who made every child feel special
Her second son had a special place in her heart.
special.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a special position or job has a particular purpose or aim, and continues only until that purpose or aim is achieved
special.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Mitchell acted as a special envoy in the Northern Ireland peace talks.
special.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: Pay special attention to how you clean the wound.
special.translation[1].definitions[0].de: something that is not usual or ordinary, and is made or done for a special purpose
special.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: a TV special on the election
special.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a lower price than usual for a particular product for a short period of time
special.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Breyer’s ice cream is on special this week.
special.translation[2].definitions[0].de: not ordinary or usual but different in some way and often better or more important
special.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: They’re doing a special promotion on digital cameras.
Special bonuses were paid to top executives.
special.translation[2].definitions[1].de: used to describe someone who has had a position specially created for them
special.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: He accepted the appointment as special adviser on National Security Affairs.
a special assistant to the director
special.translation[3].definitions[0].de: a lower price than usual for a particular product for a short period of time
special.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: This month, the bar will have a special on wine by the glass.
Breyer’s ice-cream is on special this week.
